title: Amundi Goes On-Chain With Euro Cash Fund as ETH/BTC Signals a Major Upside Move
body: Ethereum just secured a tokenized euro cash fund from Amundi while traders say its BTC pair is building a base for upside. Together, the on-chain fund launch and bullish ETH/BTC structure show both institutions and charts leaning toward Ethereum at the same time. Amundi Puts Euro Cash Fund Shares on Ethereum Amundi, Europe’s largest asset manager, has launched its first tokenized share class of a euro money-market fund on the Ethereum blockchain, marking one of the highest-profile on-chain fund moves so far in the region. The product uses the AMUNDI FUNDS CASH EUR money-market fund and went live with its first on-chain transaction on Nov. 4, 2025. The new “J28 EUR DLT” share class records fund units and transactions directly on Ethereum while the underlying UCITS fund structure, euro-denominated assets and NAV calculations stay inside Amundi’s existing regulated framework. Subscriptions, redemptions and ownership records run through smart contracts and a tokenization stack built with European asset-servicing group CACEIS, which also provides investor wallets and digital order routing. Ethereum serves as the settlement and registry layer for this share class, giving distributors and institutional clients a blockchain-based option alongside traditional channels. Amundi and CACEIS say the hybrid setup is designed to streamline order processing, improve traceability of units on-chain and support around-the-clock execution as rules and market plumbing catch up with tokenized fund operations. The launch places Amundi in a growing field of global managers bringing money-market and cash products onto public networks such as Ethereum, after earlier tokenized fund initiatives from Franklin Templeton, UBS Asset Management and BlackRock. Industry data shows tokenized money-market and treasury products have climbed into the multi-billion-dollar range in 2025, underscoring how Ethereum is becoming a key venue for institutional fund tokenization. Ethereum Builds Range as Break Hints Higher Meanwhile, Ethereum trades inside a falling channel after a 144% historical swing highlighted on the chart, followed by a long correction from March 2025 highs. The 3-day candles compress near multi-month horizontal support between 0.03237 BTC and 0.02601 BTC, showing a defined institutional band viewed as downside exhaustion areas. ETH/BTC 3-Day Chart. Source: CryptoMichNL On the chart, the indicator panel above shows RSI sliding from the 60-plus zone into lower levels, reflecting weaker momentum during the downtrend. Because price recently bounced, ETH holds above the rising 50-period EMA, which curves upward near 0.027 on the vertical axis, acting as dynamic short-term support. Then, analyst CryptoMichNL posted that “ETH looks primed for the next leg upwards.” After that, the 3-day chart showed higher lows forming during consolidation. It also captured a break above the falling resistance line that capped earlier rallies. As a result, the pattern signals potential continuation on higher timeframes. However, resistance remains near the upper boundary of the recent channel around 0.03315 BTC. If ETH fully clears that zone, the next liquidity pockets on the chart align toward prior swing highs, where sellers previously stepped in. Still, the move stays conditional on pattern completion, not narrative opinion.

title: Oscar Ramos: XRP and Altcoins’ Bull Market Haven’t Even Started
body: The crypto world may be buzzing about Bitcoin’s rally, but for many altcoin investors, this could be just the warm‑up. A prominent voice in the scene, Oscar Ramos, recently declared that while Bitcoin’s bull market is unfolding, the real surge for altcoins is yet to begin. This statement, spotlighted by Angry Crypto Show on X, has reignited hopes for a major broad‑market crypto breakout. Shifting Market Dynamics Recent data from November 2025 shows a drop in Bitcoin’s market dominance (BTC.D) from over 61% to about 58.8%. Historically, such declines often precede periods when capital flows from Bitcoin into altcoins. Investors and analysts view this rotation as a foundational condition for a sustained altcoin rally. Supporting that view, research from Q3 2025 by major crypto‑market trackers indicates that altcoins began capturing a larger share of overall market capitalization. A rising share of altcoins suggests renewed investor appetite—not just for Bitcoin, but for high‑potential tokens like XRP, Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Binance Coin (BNB), and Cardano (ADA). JUST IN: XRP Enthusiast Oscar Ramos, with over 165,000 Subscribers on YouTube, says "I have seen the bull market for Bitcoin, but altcoins? XRP, Ethereum, Solana, BNB, Cardano—altcoins haven't even started." pic.twitter.com/w5fmTGtie1 — Angry Crypto Show (@angrycryptoshow) November 27, 2025 At the same time, many altcoins remain significantly below their cycle highs. That leaves room for upside if the market turns bullish. For tokens like XRP that already enjoy strong community backing and real‑world adoption narratives, the potential rewards could be substantial. What Must Happen for the Altcoin Rally to Materialize Still, the path ahead is not guaranteed. For a full‑scale altcoin bull market, several factors must align. First, capital must continue rotating away from Bitcoin — sustained dominance decline is a key signal. Second, macroeconomic conditions must stay favorable. Institutional interest, regulatory clarity, and liquidity inflows are crucial drivers for broader crypto adoption. Without those, even promising altcoins may struggle to break out. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Third, within the altcoin space, performance could remain uneven. While large‑caps tend to lead any rally, smaller or under‑capitalized tokens often suffer from higher volatility and risk. Investors will need to be selective and maintain risk discipline. Why Oscar Ramos’s Call Is Resonating Now Oscar Ramos’s bold message echoes a sentiment growing among crypto analysts: the “easy money” may still lie ahead. Given the current rotation in dominance, rising altcoin market share, and still‑favorable valuation levels, his forecast has a credible foundation. The fact that this view comes from an influencer with a large, engaged audience helps amplify its impact across the community. His thesis also provides a counterpoint to narratives that suggest Bitcoin’s rally is the climax of the cycle. Instead, Ramos frames the Bitcoin run as just the beginning — the first act of a broader performance that has yet to unfold. A Cautious but Bullish Outlook If market conditions remain supportive, 2026 could open a new chapter for altcoins. For investors in XRP, ETH, SOL, BNB, ADA, and others, this could be the time to position for gains. Still, risk remains: volatility, macro headwinds, and selective performance among altcoins all pose potential obstacles. Ramos’s view does not guarantee a smooth ride, but it offers a compelling roadmap: Bitcoin leads the way — and altcoins may still be getting ready for their breakout. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Shocking IRYS Airdrop Exploitation: Single Entity Grabs 20% Supply, Dumps $4 Million
body: BitcoinWorld Shocking IRYS Airdrop Exploitation: Single Entity Grabs 20% Supply, Dumps $4 Million Have you ever wondered how fair cryptocurrency airdrops really are? A shocking revelation from blockchain analytics firm Bubblemaps exposes how a single entity managed to claim a staggering 20% of the entire IRYS airdrop supply. This massive IRYS airdrop grab involved 900 separate wallets that were strategically funded right before the token launch, raising serious questions about airdrop fairness and decentralization. How Did This IRYS Airdrop Exploitation Happen? The investigation reveals a sophisticated operation where one entity coordinated hundreds of wallets to maximize their IRYS airdrop rewards. According to Bubblemaps, these 900 wallets received funding immediately before the IRYS airdrop launch, suggesting careful planning and timing. This approach allowed the entity to bypass intended distribution limits and accumulate an unprecedented portion of the total supply. The immediate selling pressure began almost as soon as the tokens were claimed. The entity quickly moved $4 million worth of IRYS tokens to Bitget exchange, creating significant downward pressure on the token’s price. This rapid dump affected other legitimate participants who received the IRYS airdrop through proper channels. What Does This Mean for Future Airdrops? This IRYS airdrop incident highlights several critical issues in cryptocurrency distribution models: Airdrop farming has become increasingly sophisticated Current anti-sybil measures may be insufficient Legitimate users suffer from immediate price impacts Trust in fair distribution mechanisms is compromised The situation demonstrates how determined actors can game the system, even in supposedly decentralized environments. The IRYS airdrop case serves as a wake-up call for projects planning token distributions. Moreover, it shows why blockchain analytics tools have become essential for detecting such patterns. Can We Prevent Future IRYS Airdrop Manipulation? Projects can implement several strategies to protect against similar exploitation in future airdrops. First, they can use more sophisticated wallet analysis to detect coordinated behavior. Second, implementing longer vesting periods could discourage immediate dumping. Third, gradual claim periods might help identify suspicious patterns before full distribution. The IRYS airdrop incident particularly concerns because of the scale involved. Claiming 20% of any airdrop supply represents a significant concentration that goes against decentralization principles. Therefore, the crypto community must develop better standards for fair distribution. Key Takeaways from the IRYS Airdrop Incident This case provides valuable lessons for both projects and participants. For projects, it emphasizes the need for robust anti-sybil mechanisms. For users, it shows the importance of understanding airdrop dynamics before participating. The IRYS airdrop situation also highlights why due diligence matters in every aspect of cryptocurrency participation. Ultimately, the IRYS airdrop exploitation serves as a crucial case study in cryptocurrency distribution challenges. It demonstrates how economic incentives can lead to sophisticated gaming of systems designed to be fair and inclusive. The community must learn from this IRYS airdrop experience to build better systems for the future. Frequently Asked Questions What is an IRYS airdrop? An IRYS airdrop is a distribution of IRYS tokens to cryptocurrency wallet addresses, typically used to reward early supporters or promote adoption. How did one entity claim 20% of the IRYS airdrop? The entity used 900 separate wallets that were funded immediately before the airdrop snapshot, allowing them to meet eligibility criteria across multiple addresses. What is airdrop farming? Airdrop farming involves creating multiple wallets or accounts to maximize rewards from token distributions, often against the spirit of fair distribution. How much did the entity sell from the IRYS airdrop? The entity sold $4 million worth of IRYS tokens shortly after claiming them, depositing the funds to Bitget exchange. Can this happen with other airdrops? Yes, similar exploitation can occur with any airdrop that doesn’t have robust anti-sybil measures and wallet analysis systems in place. What can projects do to prevent this? Projects can implement wallet clustering analysis, longer vesting periods, gradual claim processes, and more sophisticated eligibility criteria. Your shares help educate the community and promote healthier cryptocurrency ecosystems! title: Revolutionary Cardano Infrastructure Development: 70 Million ADA Investment Powers Crypto Future
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Cardano Infrastructure Development: 70 Million ADA Investment Powers Crypto Future Cardano is making a massive move that could reshape its entire ecosystem. The blockchain platform has officially requested 70 million ADA from its treasury to fuel comprehensive Cardano infrastructure development through 2026. This strategic investment aims to transform Cardano into a more robust and interconnected network. Why Is Cardano Infrastructure Development So Crucial? The requested 70 million ADA represents one of the most significant funding proposals in Cardano’s history. This Cardano infrastructure development initiative targets five key areas that will strengthen the entire network. The project plans substantial investments in stablecoin onboarding, institutional custody solutions, cross-chain bridges, on-chain analysis tools, and oracle services. Each component plays a vital role in Cardano’s growth strategy. Stablecoin integration will bring more liquidity to the ecosystem. Institutional custody solutions will attract larger investors. Cross-chain bridges will connect Cardano with other blockchain networks, while enhanced analysis tools and oracles will improve functionality and data reliability. What Benefits Will This Cardano Infrastructure Development Bring? This comprehensive Cardano infrastructure development promises multiple advantages for users and investors. The funding will directly impact network performance and utility. Here are the key benefits users can expect: Enhanced interoperability through cross-chain bridges Improved liquidity with stablecoin integration Greater institutional participation via custody solutions Better analytics for informed decision-making Reliable data feeds through oracle services The timing of this Cardano infrastructure development initiative aligns with the platform’s long-term roadmap. By addressing these core components simultaneously, Cardano positions itself as a more competitive and complete blockchain solution. How Will This Cardano Investment Impact the Broader Crypto Space? This ambitious Cardano infrastructure development project signals the platform’s commitment to becoming a leading blockchain ecosystem. The 70 million ADA investment demonstrates serious dedication to building sustainable infrastructure. Moreover, it shows confidence in Cardano’s treasury model and community governance. The focus on cross-chain compatibility particularly stands out. As blockchain interoperability becomes increasingly important, Cardano’s bridge development could position it as a central hub in the multi-chain future. This strategic Cardano infrastructure development addresses current market needs while preparing for future growth. What Challenges Might This Cardano Initiative Face? While the Cardano infrastructure development plan appears comprehensive, successful implementation requires careful execution. The project team must manage multiple development streams simultaneously while maintaining network stability. Additionally, they need to ensure community support throughout the multi-year timeline. Market conditions and regulatory developments could also influence the project’s trajectory. However, the structured approach to Cardano infrastructure development suggests thorough planning and risk assessment. The phased implementation through 2026 allows for adjustments based on real-world feedback and changing market dynamics. Conclusion: A Transformative Step for Cardano This 70 million ADA investment represents a pivotal moment in Cardano’s evolution. The comprehensive Cardano infrastructure development plan addresses critical gaps while positioning the platform for sustained growth. By focusing on core ecosystem components, Cardano demonstrates its commitment to building a truly decentralized and functional blockchain network that can compete at the highest level. Frequently Asked Questions How much ADA is Cardano requesting for development? Cardano has requested 70 million ADA from its treasury to fund infrastructure development through 2026. What areas will this funding support? The investment will target stablecoin onboarding, institutional custody, cross-chain bridges, on-chain analysis, and oracle services. Why is Cardano infrastructure development important? Infrastructure development strengthens the entire ecosystem, improves user experience, and attracts more participants to the network. How long will this development project take? The development initiative is planned to continue through 2026, representing a multi-year commitment to ecosystem growth. Will this affect ADA token value? While cryptocurrency values are volatile, strong infrastructure development typically supports long-term ecosystem health and potential value appreciation. Who approves the funding request? The Cardano treasury system involves community governance, meaning ADA holders participate in funding decisions through voting mechanisms.
